com.example.myurbanflix

Class FirestoreAdapter<VH extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder>

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<VH>
      • com.example.myurbanflix.FirestoreAdapter<VH>
  • Type Parameters:
    VH -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.firebase.firestore.EventListener<com.google.firebase.firestore.QuerySnapshot>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MovieReviewAdapter

    public abstract class FirestoreAdapter<VH extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder>
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<VH>
implements com.google.firebase.firestore.EventListener<com.google.firebase.firestore.QuerySnapshot>
    Class is used as a firebase adapter which wraps around recyclerview.adapter and optimizes recycler for user with google firebase
